## Installation

You can install the most recent version of STAVE using:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mrc-ide/STAVE")
```

It is good practice to specify a version number to ensure your scripts will run even if the package changes over time (backward-compatibility is not guaranteed). To install a specific version you can use the following format:

``` r
devtools::install_github("mrc-ide/STAVE@v2.0.0")
```

see the "Tags" section of the [main Github page](https://github.com/mrc-ide/STAVE) for the latest version number.
